region: <region in which to operate, example: us-ashburn-1, us-phoenix-1>
private_key_path: <path to the private key that matches the fingerprint above>
master_mysql_root_password: <password for 'root@localhost' account of the MySQL master server>
slaves_mysql_root_password: <password for 'root@localhost' account of the MySQL slave servers>
master_slaves_replicate_acount: <MySQL replication account for synchronization between the master server and the slave servers>
